description:
Take a detailed look at how I built this sinister looking chapel for my D&D game.

Get the Drunken & Dragons Index Card RPG Here: http://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/201214/INDEX-CARD-RPG-Vol-1

Channels referenced:
(TWS) Tabletop Workshop: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnLu5I4fTj1OHtKrNotFKxA

TWS video showing door technique: https://youtu.be/DF50tWnTPaA?t=5m3s

Dungeons & Gluesticks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZvZvalRLgkGXmFTpHEJBiw

Lukes APS: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsmD5774MOQhjYBkXqu3Jdw

Join BMC on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Black-Magic-Craft-677344725740094/?ref=bookmarks

title: Project Showcase: Sinister Chapel / Cathedral for D&D (Episode 017)
